text:
yuq~jjatEq mana# uqta yu#~jjatEq dhiyOq viprAq vipra#sya bRuhaqtO vi#paqScita#H | 
vi hOtrA# dadhE vayunAq vidEkaq inmaqhI dEqvasya# saviqtuH pari#ShTutiH ||
suqvAgdE#vaq duryAq(gm)q A va#da dEvaqSrutau# dEqvEShvA GO#ShEthAqmA nO# 
vIqrO jA#yatAM karmaqNyO# ya(gm) sarvE#&nuq jIvA#maq yO ba#hUqnAmasa#dvaqSI |
iqdaM ~MviShNuq rvica#kramE trEqdhA ni da#dhE paqdaM | 
sa mU#Dhamasya - [  ] 25
